goal_name: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
target_name: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
indicator_name: Average annual household income from tourism
GoalDescription: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
IndicatorDescription: Average annual household income from tourism
ComputationMethod: (Amount  of income earned per household annually from toursim)/(Total number of household)
Concept: Source of Income that is earned by households annually from tourism activities undertaken especially within the rural communities.
DataSource:
* Department of Trades.
* department of Tourism
Definition: * Tourism sector has created opportunities to surrounding communities to generate income through selling artefacts and other items they produce including food. Annual household income is the measure of the amount of income available to an average household in the area that is earned through tourism activities to generate income.
Rationale:
* Indicates how much the communities earn from tourism activities annually
* Depicts creativity in toursim activities within the rural communities.
* Indicates how much the tourism sector impacts the rural communities in terms of annual income per household.
source_organisation_1: 2010 HIES using (p146) total monthly household income from handicrafts divided by total project number of households (50,740) multiplied by 12 for annual estimate, VNSO
